00069           public function doCMD($cmd){
00070                     
00071                     if(!$this->isinitialized){
00072                               $this->init();
00073                               $this->isinitialized=true;
00074                     }
00075                     
00076                     // CMD LOG Aus/einschalten
00077                     //$this->docmdlog(true/false);
00078                     
00079                     list($err,$ret)=$this->do_cmd($cmd['cmd']);
00080                     echo "<pre>";
00081                     echo "--------";
00082                     print_r($ret);
00083                     echo "--------";
00084                     print_r($this->errlog);
00085                     echo "--------";
00086                     print_r($this->cmdlog);
00087                     echo "--------";
00088                     echo "</pre>";
00089 
00090           }
00097           private function init(){
00098                     
00099                     if(zimbraConfig::_ssh_server=='' || zimbraConfig::_ssh_port=='' ||zimbraConfig::_ssh_user=='' ||zimbraConfig::_ssh_pass=='' ||zimbraConfig::_ssh_domain=='' || zimbraConfig::_shellZimbraUser==''){
00100                               return array(zerror::err('False Configuration',null,zerror::critical),null);
00101                     }
00102           
00103                     $this->sysuser=zimbraConfig::_ssh_user.'@'.zimbraConfig::_ssh_domain.':';
00104                     $this->vuser=zimbraConfig::_shellZimbraUser.'@'.zimbraConfig::_ssh_domain.':';
00105                     
00106                     // do connect...
00107                     if(!($con=ssh2_connect(zimbraConfig::_ssh_server,zimbraConfig::_ssh_port))){
00108                               return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to establish connection',null,zerror::critical),null);
00109                               
00110                     }else{
00111                               if(!ssh2_auth_password($con,zimbraConfig::_ssh_user,zimbraConfig::_ssh_pass)) {
00112                                         return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to authenticate',null,zerror::critical),null);
00113                                         
00114                               }else{
00115                                         $this->cmdlog.="connection established\n";
00116                                         
00117                                         if(!($this->shell=ssh2_shell($con,'ssh',null,100,100,SSH2_TERM_UNIT_CHARS))){
00118                                                   return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to establish shell',null,zerror::critical),null);
00119                                         
00120                                         }else{
00121                                                   $this->cmdlog.="shell established\n\n";
00122                                         }
00123                               }
00124                     }
00125 
00126                     
00127                     // CMD LOG disable
00128                     //$this->docmdlog(false);
00129                               
00130                     // read welcome message                                     
00131                     list($err,$ret)=$this->doread($this->sysuser);
00132                     if($err){
00133                               return array($err,null);
00134                     }
00135                     // CMD LOG enable
00136                     $this->docmdlog(true);
00137                     
00138                     // welcome message  
00139                     #echo "-".$ret."-\n";
00140                     
00141                     
00142                     // change user to zimbrauser
00143                     $this->activeuser=$this->vuser;
00144                               
00145                     list($err,$ret)=$this->dowrite('sudo su '.zimbraConfig::_shellZimbraUser);
00146                     
00147                     if($err || strpos($ret,'~~~')!==false){
00148                               return array(zerror::err($err.$ret,null,zerror::critical),null);
00149                     }
00150           
00151                     // blank return => all okay.  
00152                     return array(null,true);
00153           }

00161           public function __destruct(){
00162                     try{
00163                               fclose($this->shell);
00164                               zlog::shelllog($this->errlog,$this->cmdlog);
00165                     }catch(Exception $e){
00166                     }

00176           private function do_cmd($cmd){
00177                     list($err,$output)=$this->dowrite($cmd);
00178                     if($err){
00179                               return array($err,null);
00180                     }
00181                     
00182                     // Wenn Fehler aufgetreten
00183                     if(strpos($output,'ERROR')!==false){
00184                               $this->errlog($cmd."\n".$ret);
00185                     }
00186                     return array(null,$output);
00187           }

00196           private function dowrite($cmd){
00197 
00198                     try{
00199                               fwrite($this->shell,$cmd."\n");
00200                     }catch(Exception $e){
00201                               return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to write command',$e,zerror::critical),null);
00202                     }
00203                     list($err,$output)=$this->doread($this->activeuser,$cmd);
00204                     
00205                     //echo "\n\n<pre>KK--$output--$cmd--".$this->activeuser.'/$--KK</pre>'."\n\n";
00206 
00207                     // Remove command, next commandline and trim the result..
00208                     $t2=str_replace(trim($cmd),'',trim($output));
00209                     $t2=str_replace($this->activeuser.'/$','',$t2);
00210                     $t2=str_replace($this->activeuser.'/root$','',$t2);
00211                     $t2=trim($t2);
00212                     
00213                     //echo "\n\n<pre>return--$t2--</pre>\n\n";
00214                     
00215                     return array(null,$t2);
00216           }

00227           private function doread($endstr='',$cmd=''){
00228                     $ts=time();
00229                     $mtime=10;
00230                     $t='';$t1='';
00231                               
00232                     if($endstr==''){
00233                               return array(zerror::err('fail: Enddelimiter failed',null,zerror::critical),null);
00234                     }else{
00235                               do{
00236                                         sleep(0.2);
00237                                         try{
00238                                                   $t1=fread($this->shell,40);
00239                                         }catch(Exception $e){
00240                                                   return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to read shell output',$e,zerror::critical),null);
00241                                         }
00242                                         // it may wants a password up and there...
00243                                         if(strpos($t1,'[sudo] password for')!==false){
00244                                                   try{
00245                                                             fwrite($this->shell,zimbraConfig::_ssh_pass."\n");
00246                                                             $t1.=" Have written sys-password!\n";
00247                                                   }catch(Exception $e){
00248                                                             return array(zerror::err('fail: unable to write password)',$e,zerror::critical),null);
00249                                                   }
00250                                         }
00251                                         
00252                                         $t.=$t1;
00253                               }while(strpos($t,$endstr)===false && (time()-$ts)<$mtime);
00254                               
00255                               //Clean wenn Command was over 50characters...
00256                               //if(strrpos($t,'')!==false){
00257                               if(strrpos($t,chr(0x08))!==false){
00258                                         $t=$this->over50normalize($t);
00259                               }
00260                     }         
00261                     
00262                     if((time()-$ts)>=$mtime){
00263                               $t.="\nTimeout Error maxtime: ".$mtime."s\n";
00264                               zlog::errlog(zerror::err("\nTimeout Error maxtime: ".$mtime."s\n",null,zerror::notcritical),$t);
00265                     }
00266                     if($this->docmdlog){
00267                               $this->cmdlog.=$t;
00268                     }else{
00269                               $this->cmdlog.=$cmd."\nZimbraSSH: Return Log momentary for this command disabled\n".strrchr($t,$endstr);
00270                               $this->cmdlog2=$t;
00271                     }
00272                     return array(null,$t);                  
00273           }
00274           
00282           private function over50normalize($str){
00283                     $c='';
00284                     $zeilen=explode(chr(0x0D),$str);
00285                     foreach($zeilen as $z){
00286                               $z=str_replace(chr(0x0D),'',$z);
00287                               $t1=strrpos($z,chr(0x08));
00288                               if($t1===false){
00289                                         $c.=$z;
00290                               }else{
00291                                         //Pos von drei leerzeichen - 1 zeichen (das davor wird gebraucht!)
00292                                         //Letztes Backspace Zeichen (davor) + das Backspacezeichen, (das danach wird gebraucht!)
00293                                         $c.=substr($z,strpos($z,'   ')-1,1).substr($z,$t1+1,strlen($z)-($t1+1));
00294                               }
00295                     
00296                     }
00297                     return $c;
00298           }
